author: Joe Brennan
title: Minister urged to act on insurers rejecting Covid-19 claims
description: Thousands of pubs, cafes, restaurants and leisure facilities have closed in recent weeks
content:
Minister for Finance Paschal Donohoe has been urged by Fianna Fail to call in insurance bosses as the industry is rejecting claims for loss of earnings as a result of coronavirus, relying on fine print and technicalities to avoid payouts.
